response.original_title: Still Crowing: Adelaide Crows 1998 Season Highlights
response.overview: If 1997 was sweet then 1998 was sublime.  This was the year the Adelaide Crows dumbfounded the judges and made a mockery of the history books. They came from fifth place, won three of their four finals and upstaged raging favourite North Melbourne. Not since Richmond 1920-21 had a team won their first and second premierships back to back For super coach Malcolm Blight this was a season of ups and downs.  We trace the Crows progress as they set out to defend their premiership, their fight to make the final eight and their battle for survival week after week We join Malcolm Blight as he faces his weekly post match media barrage. Still Crowing is a chronicle of the highlights of Adelaide in 1998.
response.title: Still Crowing: Adelaide Crows 1998 Season Highlights
